directions: In large skillet, cook sausage over medium high heat, stirring frequently until thoroughly cooked and no longer pink. Add remaining ingredients; bring to a boil. Cover and simmer on low heat for 45 minutes.
ingredients: 2 (16 ounce) packages Regular Flavor Jimmy Dean Pork Sausage
1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes and green chiles
title: Jimmy Dean Hearty Holiday Chili
